## arrays.ArrayLength class

Matches an Array whose length is within the specified range (or 1-infinity if not specified).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ArrayLength extends AnyMatcher
```

**Extends:** [AnyMatcher](./test-equivalence-matchers.base.anymatcher.md)
